body.name: Lictin Baby Doll Carrier, Front and Back Doll Accessories Carrier for Little Girls, with Adjustable Straps for Stuffed Animal Reborn Baby Doll
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 23 hrs 2 mins
features: Comfortable Fabric - Crafted from premium, skin-friendly pure cotton, Lictin baby doll carrier exemplifies unparalleled comfort. Its lightweight, durable construction not only withstands the rigors of time but also offers machine washability for easy maintenance. Our commitment to comfort extends to the intricately padded shoulder straps, engineered to cocoon children's delicate shoulders with the utmost coziness.

Wide Compatibility - Boasting exceptional versatility, Lictin doll carrier for kids offers wide compatibility, securely accommodating dolls ranging from 14 to 24 inches in size. You can trust that even during energetic play, running, or jumping, your precious doll will remain snugly ensconced in the carrier, ensuring their safety and your child's uninterrupted fun.

3 Carrying Ways -Lictin versatile dolls carrier offers three distinct carrying positions, which can effortlessly switch between facing-in, facing-out, and back carry orientations, catering to the diverse needs of little ones.

Adjustable Straps - Featuring adjustable straps on the shoulders, chest, and waist, Lictin dolls carrier for girls accommodates children of all ages. Its user-friendly design empowers kids to effortlessly manage the carrier, fostering independence and adaptability as they grow.

Ideal Gift - Elevate your gift-giving with our exceptional doll carrier, a distinctive choice for your child's birthday. It's designed to inspire immersive pretend play and ignite the fires of creativity, nurturing your child's imagination. A crucial reminder: this carrier is exclusively intended for dolls and is not suitable for real infants or live animals.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 52 ratings 4.7 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Adorable Dolly front/back pack for your little ones baby doll. Thick, quality material, we’ll designed & easy on off, beautiful colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So So cute!
reviews.reviewText: We are carrying around baby brother in the carrier and big sisters wanted to do the same. They can put their stuffed animals or baby dolls in it and pretend they are mommies!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for toddler
reviews.reviewText: This is so useful to me! My daughter loves to mimic me, and I got her baby strollers for her stuff animals, travel suitcases, etc. until I see this! As I have been carrying her around a lot when she's a baby and early toddler, she loves it and 'copies' from me -- she carried her toy dog/panda around, which looks hilarious! The product came in a vacuum bag (not sure why), but well protected. The fabric is smooth and sturdy, and really look like a real one for real kids. Nice made and I like it! So does my kid!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute but definitely made for smaller kids
reviews.reviewText: Both of me nieces are super into baby dolls, they both have lower end “reborn baby” dolls (not the real ones that cost hundreds, the ones you can get on Amazon for $50-$100). They carry them around everywhere! So when I saw this kids baby carrier I figured it would be perfect!This thing is definitely made for kids, and smaller kids at that. I first attempted to give this to my 9 year old niece who is pretty average stature, maybe slightly on the still has a little baby fat scale (she wears a size youth Large or youth XL depending on the brand). This didn’t fit her unfortunately. I could just, and I mean just get this clipped in the back. But because it was so tight it didn’t leave any room for the baby. Also it sits really high on her torso and was barely under her chest area. So she agreed and we ended up giving it to my niece that is 7 but is thin as a rail and short, and this works perfectly for her. So just don’t expect this to fit bigger kids.As far as the overall quality goes I really don’t have any complaints at all regarding the quality and the materials used. In fact I would go as far to say that I expected it to be worse quality than it is considering the low price point. Overall it’s cute and I would totally recommend it if you have a smaller child whom is into dolls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for baby dolls or stuffed animals
reviews.reviewText: This carrier is super cute. Its very adjustable to fit your child. You can wear it on the front or the back. Love the design and the print on it. Any kids would love this carrier. They can put so many different stuffed animals or different size baby dolls in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable for kids
reviews.reviewText: This carrier is just so adorable for kids! I love how lightweight it is and the bunny ears are such a cute touch. The carrier has a little holder inside that you can put the animal or doll in so it doesnt fall out which is so smart. It is very adjustable and customizable. Our 4 year old loves it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and fits my 3.5 year old
reviews.reviewText: This baby doll carrier is hilarious and adorable. My 3.5-year-old wears it around the house with her little doll in it like she’s a busy mom. I had to tighten it all the way for her since she’s so small, but she will be able to still play with it as she grows! It’s very durable and holds the baby in nice and tight so that the baby doesn’t even slip out during a sword fight (very important activity with her older brother, haha). It’s great at keeping the baby doll safe and happy during the sword fight! This would make a great gift for any little girl who loves to play mommy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works good. Doesn't come with instructions though, took a second to figure out how to get it on. My daughter loves it though

I got this to go with my little ones reborn doll that she's getting for christmas. So she can wear her baby when I wear mine. As she's loving copying mom. It's so cute! It goes on just like the real baby ones. Looks identical, just smaller. So she's gonna think it's just like mine.She's gonna be so happy!

Tolle Puppentrage für Puppenmamis. Sie sieht total süß aus und sehe unkompliziert für die jüngeren Mamis. Es passen sehr viele Puppen, Kuscheltiere hinein. Einziges Manko, die Kinder können sie hinten nicht selber zu machen aber das klappt bei den richtigen Babytragen auch nicht immer problemlos daher ist das kein großes Problem.

Die Lictin Puppentrage hat unsere Erwartungen mehr als erfüllt und ist ein absolutes Must-Have für kleine Puppenmamas. Die 3-in-1-Funktion ermöglicht es, die Puppe auf unterschiedliche Weisen zu tragen, was die Spielmöglichkeiten vielseitig gestaltet.Das Material, 100% Baumwolle, verleiht der Puppentrage eine angenehme Haptik und macht sie sehr hautfreundlich. Die Verarbeitung ist qualitativ hochwertig, was der kleinen Trägerin ein realistisches Trageerlebnis bietet. Die Liebe zum Detail zeigt sich insbesondere im niedlichen Tierdesign.Was diese Puppentrage besonders ansprechend macht, ist ihre Ähnlichkeit zu einer echten Babytrage. Dies fördert nicht nur die Fantasie der Kinder, sondern ermöglicht es ihnen auch, die Rolle einer fürsorglichen Mutter nachzuempfinden. Die Puppentrage ist leicht anzulegen und vermittelt den kleinen Puppenmamas ein Gefühl von Verantwortung und Fürsorglichkeit.Ein weiterer positiver Aspekt ist, dass es keinen unangenehmen Geruch beim Auspacken gab. Dies zeigt die gute Verarbeitung und die Verwendung von schadstofffreien Materialien. Die Puppentrage eignet sich nicht nur hervorragend als Spielzeug, sondern kann auch dabei helfen, soziale Fähigkeiten und Empathie bei Kindern zu fördern.Insgesamt sind wir von der Lictin Puppentrage begeistert und können sie allen Eltern empfehlen, die ihren Kindern eine realistische und liebevolle Spielumgebung bieten möchten. Dieses Puppenzubehör bringt nicht nur strahlende Kinderaugen, sondern fördert auch wertvolle Entwicklungsaspekte auf spielerische Weise.!

reviews.reviewTitle: So cute and easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: This is much easier to use than most real baby harnesses (lol), especially when you’re putting it on your child and not on yourself. It’s lightweight and has only two buckles. The buckles are located behind the back (one hip and one shoulder height) so younger children like my 2.5yo wouldn’t be able to buck themselves but an older child may be.My daughter loves it for carrying around her Melissa and Doug doll.

reviews.reviewTitle: Tolle trage für Kleinkinder und ihre Puppen
reviews.reviewText: Unsere Kinder lieben die Trage. Mutter Vater Kind ist ein noch beliebteres Spiel geworden.
